review: I had a great experience at Baby Buns Philly! The Taiwanese fried chicken slider was absolutely delicious, with a perfect balance of sweet, spicy, and crunchy flavors. The truffle fries were a fantastic side dish, adding a luxurious touch to the meal. While the prices are a bit steep, the quality of the food and the friendly service made it worth it. I'll definitely be back to try more of their creative menu options.
